title: Landscapes in Central lran
content: In the vast area of central Iran, a lot of geological scenery can be seen; yet here only a few of these sites has been brought under study. Andesite-Dacitic domes with unique and scenic forms have emerged in the Dahej region in Kerman. The unconformable discontinuity in the Cretaceous and late Jurassic formation in Raver region of Kerman is one of the most scenic types of great unconformity. In addition, the alluvial fans are among the other scenic phenomena in the central lran region.

gallery.caption: GL27-1 :A huge alluvial fan facing Mahan town, Kerman, by Google Earth

GL27-4 :An angular unconformity between the Cretaceous and Jurassic formations near Ravr
GL27-6 :Another angular unconformity between the Cretaceous and Jurassic formations near Ravr
GL27-7 :A scenic landscape of conglomerate and sandstone layers (Eocene) near Yazd
